column5: Some things dont change around here.Went into the local tackle shop and see HT products.Asked if they could get me a cover,,,,,NOPE Like they couldnt be bothered even to look into the KTL book to see.Not very good if you want to bring in bussness from a local. Headed up to CTC,they seem to want to help,but if they cant get it,anyone know where I can get one.  Thanks

Fired off an email  to HT, explaining my event today. Im not one for being treated like I was.You want to sell a product,you better be able to support that product and help your future sales.   Anyone have Justin H email? I believe he is a  HT rep.

Brian, doesn't appear to be the most common item, but, this company ships within Canada from a "local" warehouse to beat the taxes.  Scroll about 1/2 way down the page, listed at $25. http://www.extacklestore.com/winter/ice_shelters.htm
Funny thing is,back when I had my first one,Lou got it for me no prob.  Thanks for the link Erich.
